title: BT69012: Plant Biotechnology Laboratory - Quick Facts
text:
BT69012
Course name | PLANT BIOTECHNOLOGY LABORATORY
Offered by | Biotechnology
Credits | 2
L-T-P | 0-0-3
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Culture initiation; cell suspension culture; micropropagation of herbaceous & woody plants; comparative study of solid & liquid media for micropropagation; suitabilities of different matrices for micropropagation; cell suspension culture in bioreactors; production of a secondary metabolite in culture; biotransformation by cell line. Extraction and purification of one secondary metabolite.
